description: A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suit or the capital A in the center of the face, there's a picture of person with a backpack walking, and next to it, a double-chevron pointing to the right.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a picture of a target-practice sheet with a very tight group of shots.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a picture of a boot about to stop on the invisible ground, and a symbol of a speaker emitting little sound.
A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a muscle cuirass with a pike laid over it.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of an assault rifle leaving a trail as its muzzle rises, and next to it, an arrow pointing down.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a picture of a person sprinting, and next to it, a double-chevron pointing right.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a picture of a martial fighter with their upper body recoiled backwards, as if in avoidance.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a human upper body, with bladed and blunt weapons flying over their head.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of battery at a low charge, with an arrow pointing upwards in a corner next to it.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a picture of an assault rifle with two pluses in a corner next to it.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a sword leaving a trail as it moves to the right.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a picture of an assault rifle with a pair of binoculars in the corner next to it.
A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a picture of a person mid-back somersault.
